title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 86.2 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 86.2 - Application

State Regulations

Eligible teachers seeking a grant pursuant to Education

Law, section 3004-a and this Part shall submit an application in a form
provided by the commissioner. Such application shall include documentation that
the applicant is an eligible teacher, which may include a written statement
signed by an officer of the sponsoring school district verifying that the
applicant is employed as a tenured teacher by such sponsoring district. Notes

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
